title: kAdalAghinEn unnai
sahitya:
kAdalAghinEn unnaik-kANak-kANak-kANa nALum


anupallavi

  mAdhavA harE krSNA jayamanOharA


caraNam 1    vENugAnam kETTa pOdE vEga dAhamAginEn
nANam accam viTTun aDiyai nADinEn jaganmOhanA mighak-
    caraNam 2    catur maraiyin sAramAna sarva jIva nAthanE
madhura bhAvanaiyil unnai mArbuDan aNaindu konjak-
